the bag  the next section is the band with the drawstring  the bottom is then closed up and the edging worked  lastly the drawstring is made and inserted description of invisible join pull up a loop after the last stitch of the round remove hook and insert hook from the back to front under both top loops of the next stitch first stitch of round grab loop and pull to the back leaving the hook in loop tighten with new colour yarn pull a loop through ch1 work the first stitch of the next round in the same stitch see my video for the invisible join https //youtu be/idaofsrgxlm top tip use a larger hook to work your starting foundation chain so your work does not pull in i used a 3 5mm hook for the i-cord to start work a foundation chain of 50 stitches either chainless foundation i-cord or chains carefully join to the first stitch/chain with a slip_stitch without twisting the work start working the mosaic section star mosaic section using a 2 5mm hook a r 1 ch1 sc25 x 2 join and
